Metadata.doubleIndent: A######: HornMorpho ِoriginal entry (F: Farsi, H: Hindi, N: Sinhalese, S: Syriac, T: Tamil, U: Urdu)
Metadata.indent: ASIPA: Reading for Asian entry (International Phonetic Alphabet)
ARIPA: Reading for Arabic (International Phonetic Alphabet)
Metadata.doubleIndent: Ncol [CC]: Regional colloquial Arabic Noun, ISO3166-3 Alpha-2 country codes, apply only to MSA otherwise
Vcol [CC]: Regional colloquial Arabic Verb, ISO3166-3 Alpha-2 country codes, apply only to MSA otherwise
Metadata.indent: Language: Asian language, ISO 639-3 three-letter code
Gloss: English meaning of the Asian entry

Entry.Gloss: a command, an order, a summons
in that, on account of, because, for this reason, a compound of
The intent, the purpose, the intention, the meaning, the ulterior motive
in, into, within, inside, in the midst
of, pertaining to, belonging to, made of, from
pair, conjugation, name of an accent
per, in accordance with, according to
from (a starting point), out of, at, on, of, with (in company of someone)
on, over and in contact with, at the surface of and supported by, upon, above, on top of
with, together with, among / amongst / amidst
writer, scribe, copyist, amanuensis, secretary, notary
